Common Items.name: whiskey
Common Items.description: Any Phase: Discard Whiskey to reduce any Sanity loss by 1.

Common Items.name: .18 derringer
Common Items.description:
+2 to Combat checks
.18 Derringer cannot be lost or stolen unless you choose to allow it.

Common Items.name: knife
Common Items.description: +1 to Combat checks.

Common Items.name: cavalry saber
Common Items.description: +2 to Combat checks.

Common Items.name: bullwhip
Common Items.description:
+1 to Combat checks
Any Phase: Exhaust to re-roll 1 die after making a Combat Check.

Common Items.name: .38 revolver
Common Items.description: +3 to Combat checks.

Common Items.name: .45 automatic
Common Items.description: +4 to Combat checks.

Common Items.name: lucky cigarette case
Common Items.description: Any Phase: Discard Lucky Cigarette Case to re-roll any one skill check.

Common Items.name: axe
Common Items.description:
+2 to Combat checks
(+3 instead if your other hand is empty).

Common Items.name: dynamite
Common Items.description:
+8 to Combat checks
(Discard after use).

Common Items.name: cross
Common Items.description:
+0 to Combat checks
(+3 if Opponent is Undead)
+1 to Horror Checks.

Common Items.name: motorcycle
Common Items.description: Movement: Exhaust to get 2 extra movement points.

Common Items.name: map of arkham
Common Items.description: Movement: Exhaust to get 1 extra movement point.

Common Items.name: food
Common Items.description: Any Phase: Discard Food to reduce any Stamina loss by 1.

Common Items.name: old journal
Common Items.description: Movement: Exhaust and spend 1 movement point to make a Lore (-1) check. If you pass, gain 3 Clue tokens and discard Old Journal. If you fail, nothing happens.

Common Items.name: research materials
Common Items.description: Any Phase: Discard Research Materials instead of spending 1 Clue token.

Common Items.name: tommy gun
Common Items.description: +6 to Combat checks.

Common Items.name: shotgun
Common Items.description:
+4 to Combat checks
Any Phase: When using Shotgun in Combat, all 6's rolled count as 2 successes.

Common Items.name: rifle
Common Items.description: +5 to Combat checks

Common Items.name: ancient tome
Common Items.description: Movement: Exhaust and spend 2 movement points to make a Lore (-1) check. If you pass, draw 1 Spell and discard Ancient Tome. If you fail, nothing happens.

Common Items.name: dark cloak
Common Items.description: +1 to Evade checks

Common Items.name: lantern
Common Items.description: +1 to Luck checks
